entropy.view

Interface View


  • public interface View

    Add informations to a problem. Those informations may be directly added to the problem on the #associate(ReconfigurationProblem) call, or added on demand when the associated constraints require their ReconfigurationProblem

    A view is not supposed to be added to several ReconfigurationProblems at the same time, and doing so may crash

    The constraints should be EITHER managed by the view, using getRequestedRules() and addRule(Rule), or externally by the problem launcher.

    When the problem has been resolved and a solution found (or no solution), the solver will call #endSolving() for the views to retrieve their results

    Author:
    Guillaume Le LouÃ«t [guillaume.lelouet@gmail.com]2013

      • post

        void post(choco.kernel.solver.constraints.SConstraint<? extends choco.kernel.solver.variables.Var> eq)

      • onNewVar

        void onNewVar(choco.kernel.solver.variables.Var var)
        Declares a new variable has been created by this view. Only variables directly created by the view should be declared, i.e. the views must not declare the variables created by other views.
        Parameters:
        var -
